record.jsxtip: Fires after the user drags the handle of this slider to a different value or clicks along this slider to move the handle to that position. Canceling this event prevents the slider position from changing.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires at every mouse move while the user drags the handle of this slider.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this slider is removed from the DOM.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the parent of this slider before it is removed from the DOM.
